getLightBumps() - Method in class org.jointheleague.erik.irobot.IRobotAdapter
 
getLightBumps() - Method in interface org.jointheleague.erik.irobot.IRobotInterface
Returns an array of length 6 where the values are from 0 to 5:

Light Bump Left Light Bump Front Left Light Bump Center Left Light Bump Center Right Light Bump Front Right Light Bump Right

The returned values are the signal strengths, where the maximum strength is 4095.

getLightBumps() - Method in class org.jointheleague.erik.irobot.SimpleIRobot
